name: Bunker House Arcade
description:
This game was made for the 2022 Secret Santa Game Jam! It took me about a week to complete, working for about 20 hours on it in total. Originally, the scale of this project was much bigger, although due to me becoming busier than expected, I had a change of plan.

The game consists of 2 arcade style games, an arcade style top down car racing game, and a 1st person "doom" style shoot-em-up arcade game; with an interactable Arcade "lobby" scene.

The game was really fun to work on, and I do plan on returning to this game idea to create more arcade style games, a better arcade lobby scene, and pull it all together much better than it is now, with that being said, I do hope you enjoy what I put together!

This game was created for https://charbomber.itch.io/!

Special thanks to https://strawberrycheetah.itch.io/ for helping with some in-game art!

Extra Information about the game:

Within the shoot-em-up game, you have 2 weapons! Switch using Number 1,2 or using your scroll wheel.

To Complete the shoot-em-up game, you need to collect 4 keys, to then open the final door at the end of the cave! (you'll know what it means in game i promise)
